title: Process a Premium Refund
description: A customer removed a vehicle from their policy, resulting in a credit balance that needs to be refunded.

tasks.description: Identify the customer's account and the credit balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system flags an account with a credit balance due to a policy change.

tasks.description: Verify the amount of the refund due.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the exact refund amount.

tasks.description: Process the refund check to be mailed to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the refund payment.
